text: noisy pipes here trump typing anyday 🙄
once thought neighbor’s late-night coding was morse code signals from spies 🤔 turned out he just types REALLY loud
handled unexpected project pivot solo, definite 'adult' signal
first real job made me feel like i'd stepped up – budgeting rent isn't fun but feels pretty adult

software devs aren't living in dark rooms surrounded by multiple screens hacking into mainframes all day for sure we do love our code but there's way more meetings than movies ever show gotta keep those specs right if anything it's death by jira tickets rather than caffeine overdose lol
software engineers 'living' on ramen... more like overtime!
debugging everyday stuff outta habit now
over here you feel society pressing hard just expecting next-level career moves post-30
sometimes feeling lost makes you dive deep into work instead
not everyone rediscovers lost passions when flying solo sometimes it’s just more time scrolling through apps than strumming guitars
not everybody turns into an eco-warrior post-breakup some just binge-watch series instead
"use time arguing bout personal life choices? nah just shrug"
just say "when i feel like it"
society expects too much sometimes imo
who says settling improves life? i'd rather level up solo
